Average multiple CIFTI files

Source: R/cifti_average.R
cifti_average.Rd

Wraps wb_command -cifti-average to compute the element-wise average across multiple CIFTI files.

Usage

cifti_average(
  cifti_out,
  cifti_in,
  weights = NULL,
  verbose = get_wb_verbosity()
)

Arguments

cifti_out

Path for the output averaged CIFTI file.

cifti_in

Character vector of input CIFTI file paths.

weights

Optional numeric vector of weights (same length as cifti_in).

verbose

Logical; print command output?

Value

The result of the underlying wb_cmd() call.

Connectome Workbench Help

Connectome Workbench is not installed. Run wb_help("-cifti-average") in a session with wb_command available.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
cifti_average(
  "group_mean.dscalar.nii",
  c("subj01.dscalar.nii", "subj02.dscalar.nii", "subj03.dscalar.nii")
)
} # }
